overview: The project began in collaboration with ordinary people: two Ivorians, who had been staying in Tunisia for a few months. For two weeks, a device was used to capture the events. The outcome is a fictional story the actors made-up, even if one would easily tend to believe it is a true story based on real events. One of these men tried to cross the desert on a donkeyâ€™s back. The donkey dies halfway through the route. The second one narrates the rest of the journey, which would end in France.
title: LifeStyle Of
